home.title: Your Trusted Dental Care
home.subtitle: We're here to keep your smile healthy and beautiful. Trusted by hundreds of families.
home.teamDescription: Our team is dedicated to providing you with top-quality dental care and personalized treatments.
home.contactMessage: If you have any questions or want to schedule an appointment, please fill out the form below.

generalDentistry.title: General Dentistry
generalDentistry.description: Routine check-ups, cleanings, fillings, and preventive care.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Braces, retainers, and other teeth alignment services.

cosmeticDentistry.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
cosmeticDentistry.description: Teeth whitening, veneers, bonding, and smile makeovers.

pediatricDentistry.title: Pediatric Dentistry
pediatricDentistry.description: Specialized dental care for children, including first visits.

periodontics.title: Periodontics
periodontics.description: Treatment of gum disease and other conditions affecting the gums.

endodontics.title: Endodontics
endodontics.description: Root canal therapy and treatment of dental pulp issues.

oralSurgery.title: Oral Surgery
oralSurgery.description: Surgical procedures including tooth extractions and jaw surgery.

dentalImplants.title: Dental Implants
dentalImplants.description: Permanent solutions for missing teeth using titanium implants.

teethWhitening.title: Teeth Whitening
teethWhitening.description: Professional whitening treatments for a brighter smile.

sedationDentistry.title: Sedation Dentistry
sedationDentistry.description: Anxiety-free dental care using sedation techniques.

crownsBridges.title: Dental Crowns and Bridges
crownsBridges.description: Restorative solutions for damaged or missing teeth.

oralHygieneEducation.title: Oral Hygiene Education
oralHygieneEducation.description: Guidance on proper brushing, flossing, and oral care routines.

drMahmoudAtef.name: Dr. Mahmoud Atef
drMahmoudAtef.description: Dr. Mahmoud specializes in preventive care, general dental procedures, and patient education.

drAhmedDahy.name: Dr. Ahmed Dahy
drAhmedDahy.description: Dr. Ahmed is an expert in orthodontics, offering solutions like braces and aligners for a perfect smile.

drMahmoudAli.name: Dr. Mahmoud Ali
drMahmoudAli.description: Dr. Mahmoud focuses on cosmetic dentistry, helping patients enhance their smile with treatments like teeth whitening and veneers.

drOmarGameel.name: Dr. Omar Gameel
drOmarGameel.description: Dr. Omar specializes in pediatric dentistry, offering gentle and caring dental care for children.

team.description: Our team is dedicated to providing you with top-quality dental care and personalized treatments.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Where Smiles Shine Brighter
about.location: We are located at **Obour City (9th District - Abbas El Akkad Street - Medical Destination Mall - Clinic G7), Cairo, Egypt**. Our team is ready to provide the best dental care. Come visit us!

features.title: About Our Dental Clinic
features.description: At our clinic, we believe that a healthy smile is a reflection of overall well-being. Our team is dedicated to providing compassionate, high-quality dental care to every patient. From preventive treatments to advanced cosmetic procedures, we ensure your dental health is our top priority.

services.text: Comprehensive dental exams and cleanings to keep your smile healthy and bright.
State-of-the-art cosmetic and restorative treatments tailored to your needs.
A friendly and welcoming environment where patient comfort comes first.

contact.title: Contact Us At Lumina Dental Studio
contact.description: For appointments, inquiries, or patient support, please reach out to us via the form below.
contact.placeholder: Describe your concern or appointment request

cases.title: Our Dental Cases
cases.description: Explore some of our successful dental treatments. Our team specializes in various dental procedures to provide the best care for our patients.

teethWhitening.title: Teeth Whitening
teethWhitening.description: This case showcases how our professional teeth whitening treatments helped the patient achieve a bright, confident smile.

orthodontics.title: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: This case highlights the transformation of a patient's smile with our orthodontic treatments, including braces and aligners.

implants.title: Dental Implants
implants.description: Our dental implant procedure restored the patient's smile and dental function, providing a permanent solution for missing teeth.
